author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Make correct shift for cassettes in the V17 geometry description of HGCal

#### PR validation:

Use the runTheMatrix test workflows. Also tested by using artificial shifts. For standard workflows no change is expected

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx334C Make correct shift for cassettes in the V17 geometry description of HGCal
